phpseclib/phpseclib.name: phpseclib/phpseclib
phpseclib/phpseclib.description: PHP Secure Communications Library - Pure-PHP implementations of RSA, AES, SSH2, SFTP, X.509 etc.

suggest.ext-libsodium: SSH2/SFTP can make use of some algorithms provided by the libsodium-php extension.
suggest.ext-openssl: Install the OpenSSL extension in order to speed up a wide variety of cryptographic operations.
suggest.ext-gmp: Install the GMP (GNU Multiple Precision) extension in order to speed up arbitrary precision integer arithmetic operations.
suggest.ext-dom: Install the DOM extension to load XML formatted public keys.

suggest.ext-mcrypt: Install the Mcrypt extension in order to speed up a few other cryptographic operations.

suggest.ext-dom: Install the DOM extension to load XML formatted public keys.
